at.nineyards.anyline.modules

Class AnylineSurfaceView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.SurfaceView
        • at.nineyards.anyline.modules.AnylineSurfaceView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public final class AnylineSurfaceView
extends android.view.SurfaceView

    A surface view far drawing visual feedback.

    NOTE: This class is experimental and should NOT be used externally, it may be changed completely in the future.
